Eric Schmidt joined Google in Auguest 2001 and at the time Larry Page said: `` Eric Schmidt is exactly the right leader for Google. His extensive technology background and vision for the potential of the Internet complement the efforts that Google is making in defining a leadership position in Internet search and navigation. His strong management experience will help shape Google as we continue our growth and global expansion. And most importantly for anyone taking on the CEO role at Google, Eric Schmidt is a natural fit with our corporate culture. " The company went on to become the powerhouse that it is today. American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
